title: No Dynamic Normal's? Why? (Dear Riot)
body:
Dear Riot

I love the new Ranked Draft

it takes away a lot of arguments over who gets what and generally just makes Ranked less scary.

However, for the OCE server, we have not received any notice, thought, passing comments, on whether or not we will receive a Dynamic Normal mode?

I understand that Blind Pick is still there, but frankly, I've had more trolls, more feeders, more generally awful people, IN NORMAL'S! When Ranked becomes more casual then Normal's, that starts to become a problem. 

Look, I'm sure, no one from Riot will even bother reading this, but if you are, I feel that you need to put your foot down with this. I don't want to move server with a higher ping just to play the mode I want.

Is there a reason? Is it on player count? size? TOO MANY KANGAROOS AND KIWI'S?!

I just want a reason.

From a Forgotten OCE Player

replies.body:
TL;DR our server is too small population wise.

Evaluations to open the queue happen regularly (as does for TT permanent/ranked) however it does not look like anything is going to change anytime soon. 

Read more about it on[ THIS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/VdoPT9GX-queue-schedule) thread. <-- will be updated if anything changed.

Thanks for showing me this.

Sorry for more or less complaining about the same thing everyone else does.
